pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, April 15, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

The Deputy Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet Committee on the federal response to the coronavirus disease (COVID-19).

Closed to media.

12:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will join ministers and Government of Canada officials to provide an update on COVID-19.

Room 225
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:45 a.m.
  • The media availability will also be held by teleconference. Toll-free (Canada/US) dial-in number: 1-866-206-0153 Passcode: 1622050#
